name: Baby ADA
description: Baby Ada is a BEP-20 utility token that aims to produce passive income for our token holders by developing various profit-generating businesses and dApp applications. On top of that, we are intending to create secure exchange as well as running our own launch pad that people can trust. As a utility token, Baby Ada team will implement Baby Ada as a form of payment for all our ecommerce stores that is operated directly by our team. Also, we will be constantly seeking partnerships to expand the number of online businesses that accept BabyADA as payment for goods and services. The more transactions occur, the more dividends you will get as an investor.
